title: Bitfinex Recovers $314K of the $3.6 Billion Stolen in 2016 Bitcoin Hack
description: The crypto exchange today announced it had recovered cash and Bitcoin Cash from the notorious hack. But there is still a lot to be recovered.

title: Axie Infinity expanding, Alex The Doge aims for change via play-to-earn features
description: Alex The Doge and Axie Infinity are popular in gaming because of introducing play-to-earn mechanics and creating immersive metaverse experiences
